shoes.name: Nike Air Force 1 GORE-TEX ®
shoes.description: The Nike Air Force 1 GORE-TEX ® retools the classic Air Force 1 with a street-approved design that meets the standards of GORE-TEX ® waterproof technology. It features water-wicking flat laces, a GORE-TEX ® bootie and GORE-TEX ® branding on the heel.
